title: Mashiro-Iro Symphony
alternative_title: Mashiro-iro Symphony: The Color of Lovers, ましろ色シンフォニー -The color of lovers-
description: Shingo’s school is decided to be joined with a girls’ school. As a selected student, Shingo temporarily transfers to the girls’ school until they officially consolidate. He meets various unique girls there, but all girls dislike male students. To remove their misunderstanding, Shingo works hard and…
